title: A deer!
description: I could attack him or continue with my exploration.

title: A skeleton!
description: There they come, I will attack them, but be very careful with the lava!

title: Is that a saber-toothed tiger?
description: This time I will use my spear!

title: A warrior with a weapon
description: Must be allied, better follow my trip ...

title: How much peace and tranquility
description: Sometimes you just have to relax and enjoy the beautiful sunset.

title: A fearsome dragon of ice!
description: Attack in a group, it's a pretty strong enemy!

title: What strange creatures
description: Although it is not time to get scared, you have to attack!

title: A pitched battle!
description: It's not bad to have fun in mini-games from time to time, we're going for the team victory!

title: A cactus with eyes and mouth?
description: I thought I had seen it all...

title: Are they meerkats?
description: I do not know, they could also be another animal...

title: A sleeping bear!
description: It would be a shame to wake him up...

title: What a beautiful mine
description: So many bright things, lava and a lot of rock, maybe I should mine and collect some minerals.

title: This looks like a dining room
description: It is possible that someone lives here, they might think that I am an intruder...

title: A hyper giant fort?
description: What is it?, What will be inside?, many questions invade my mind...

title: A cave!
description: It is possible to connect with other caves, there is much to explore yet.

title: There he comes!
description: I do not remember seeing something like that before, but I must confront your attack now!

title: A Kweebec!
description: Although this one has a weapon in his hands, even the most adorable has its explosive side...

title: Hypixel
description: An incredible server, it's not bad to play for a while there :slight_smile:

title: Antelopes in danger!
description: I will defend the antelopes, I must attack those cats!

title: Players
description: Some players having fun, great, I will say hello...

title: An owl!
description: It was a bit hidden, but I can see it...

title: An Emberwulf!
description: It literally burns in flames!

title: The cinema, an amazing place
description: Turn off the phone, the movie will start!

title: We need wood!
description: I found some trees around here, cut them!

title: A portal!
description: What will be on the other side?

title: Go for the Treasure!
description: What will be inside?

title: What the hell is that?
description: It gives me a bad feeling...

title: The ocean!
description: No doubt a very colorful place...

title: Kweebecs!
description: How adorable they look, some are just babies.

title: A beautiful puppy
description: I would like to have a pet like :)

title: VARYN
description: It is a simple portrait, but the legend says that it is someone very powerful.

title: A town!
description: It seems a pretty happy place, little by little it is progressing.

title: Ruins!
description: What will be in that place? The ocean keeps many secrets.

title: Sand, trees and palms
description: What a beautiful sight, it looks like a desert with very well defined mountains, this place looks a lot like the great canyon.

title: An aquatic cave!
description: It seems an interesting place, will there be any treasure there?

title: Cracks and a Tower
description: There is a lot of vegetation, trees, cracks, and a tower, an ideal place to start...

title: An amazing view
description: The generation of the world is quite interesting, rivers, lakes, trees, caves, varied relief, this world is very interesting...

title: The power of the Mountaintop
description: Sometimes seeing things from a mountain helps me to know this fabulous world...

title: What curious!
description: In this place darkness is not a problem, it looks quite bright!

title: A family!
description: Although this family is of chickens, maybe the chicken left an egg, I will collect it and sell it :cooking:

title: A small river!
description: That Kweebec looks happy, maybe I can catch something in this place.

title: A dragon of Ice!
description: I'll have to put this beast in its place!

title: A new sunrise!
description: In frozen places, when the moon is hidden, you can get to feel a little peace...

title: A dungeon!
description: There are many places that I should explore ...

title: It's time to rest
description: Not everything is to explore and fight, sometimes you just have to rest a moment with a good fire.

title: How many species!
description: It is curious to go deep into the ocean, new species of fish, some sunken ships and many seaweeds of different colors.

title: The YETI!
description: You never have to back down, it's time to fight!

title: An Arid zone!
description: There are palm trees, coconuts, and water, nothing bad to make me a refuge.

title: Forge!
description: It is very fun to forge, now I will be able to fight with new enemies.

title: Underground places!
description: It's a pretty hidden place, but very impressive...

title: Trorks!
description: I do not think they're friendly, it's time to fight!
